title: Assignment Spec schema.
description: Format for the assignment specification json for reference repositories.

assignment_name.title: Assignment Name schema
assignment_name.description: The identifier for this assignment in your course

maximum_group_size.title: Maximum Group Size schema
maximum_group_size.description: If students are allowed to work in groups, enter the max group size, otherwise enter 1.

ready.title: Ready schema
ready.description: Whether this assignment is ready for students to start or not.

deadline.title: Deadline schema
deadline.description: The due date for the assignment

expected_files.title: Expected Files schema
expected_files.description: Minimum files expected from student submissions

items.title: Expected File schema.
items.description: Ant-style path to a file or filename pattern, such as **/*.h or resources/foo.c

uneditables.title: Uneditables schema
uneditables.description: Files that, when changed, revert to the given default

items.title: Uneditable File schema.
items.description: Ant-style path to a file or filename pattern, such as **/*.h or resources/foo.c

testables.title: Testables schema.
testables.description: A list of logical test groups with common build outputs

items.title: Testable schema.
items.description: A group of test cases sharing a common build command

build_command.title: Build Command schema.
build_command.description: A unix command that compiles/builds the project

items.title: Test Case schema.
items.description: An individual test case worth some amount of points

command.title: Command schema.
command.description: A unix command to inspect output on

points.title: Points schema.
points.description: Point value for this test case

kind.title: Kind schema.
kind.description: What kind of test case this is

hide_expected.title: Hide Expected schema.
hide_expected.description: Whether to hide the expected output from students when they fail this test case

diff_source.title: Diff Source schema.
diff_source.description: The file that contains test output for diff-ing

expected.title: Expected schema.
expected.description: The path to the solution output, or 'generate' to have it generated

timeout.title: Timeout schema.
timeout.description: How long (in seconds) to let student code run
